title.narrative: FUNCTIONAL GOVERNANCE SYSTEM FOR THE PROVISION OF QUALITY, RELEVANT EDUCATION.

description.narrative: The education sector has a functional governance system for the provision of quality, relevant education., which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Girls and boys, in particular the most marginalized and those affected by humanitarian crises, are provided with inclusive and equitable qualityeducation and learning opportunities.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND ECONOMIC PLANNING MINECOFIN

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The education sector has a functional governance system for the provision of quality, relevant education.

description.narrative: UNICEF has coordinated work to improve the governance of the education sector resulting in the operationalization of the Teacher Management Information System, support to analyze and use teacher data for decision making, as well as preparatory work to launch the implementation of the Education Management Information System (EMIS) integration roadmap. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/08/2020

title.narrative: System Strengthening - EMIS - Availability of an Education Management Information System that transparently feeds findings back to communities or school management committees - score (1-4), see guidance
The national edcuation system promotes inclusiveness for children with disabilities
The national education system promotes equity through an Education Information Management System (EMIS) that provides disaggregated data (gender, urban/rural, wealth, disabilities)
National education system implementing a minimum package of interventions to promote inclusiveness and quality
